com.metaio.sdk

Class ARViewActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • FragmentActivity
      • com.metaio.sdk.ARViewActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    View.OnTouchListener, MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ARELActivity

    public abstract class ARViewActivity
extends FragmentActivity
implements MetaioSurfaceView.Callback, View.OnTouchListener
    This is base activity to use Metaio SDK. It creates GLSurfaceView and handle all its callbacks and lifecycle. Feel free to change the base class to other kind of Activity like ActionBarActivity from the AppCompat library

      • getGUILayout

        protected abstract int getGUILayout()
        Provide resource for GUI overlay if required.

        The resource is inflated into mGUIView which is added in onStart

        Returns:
        Resource ID of the GUI view

      • onSurfaceCreated

        public void onSurfaceCreated()
        Description copied from interface: MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
        This is called when GLSurfaceView has been created. The rendering contents can be loaded in this callback, e.g geometries. Furthermore, renderer parameters such as clipping plane limits can be updated. The audio renderer for movie textures should be registered in this callback.
        Specified by:
        onSurfaceCreated in interface MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
        See Also:
        getAudioRenderer

      • onDrawFrame

        public void onDrawFrame()
        Description copied from interface: MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
        This is called when metaio SDK should render next frame. The callback implementation must call IMetaioSDK.render() to update.
        Specified by:
        onDrawFrame in interface MetaioSurfaceView.Callback

      • onSurfaceDestroyed

        public void onSurfaceDestroyed()
        Description copied from interface: MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
        Called when OpenGL surface is destroyed
        Specified by:
        onSurfaceDestroyed in interface MetaioSurfaceView.Callback

      • onSurfaceChanged

        public void onSurfaceChanged(int width,
                             int height)
        Description copied from interface: MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
        Called when OpenGL surface is resized. The new dimensions must be passed to metaioSDK by calling metaioSDK.resizeRenderer.
        Specified by:
        onSurfaceChanged in interface MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
        Parameters:
        width - Width of the surface view
        height - Height of the surface view

        public void onLowMemory()
